Description:
Charming Cloverdale Comfort
Offering all the elements for a vibrant family lifestyle with a fabulous floorplan and situated in the sought-after Cloverdale Estate, this property is sure to appeal to a variety of buyers.
Immaculately presented, this home features a modest timber kitchen that is full of character, complete with modern appliances, dishwasher, breakfast bar and large adjoining dining area, making this the main family hub of the home.
Offering generous sized formal lounge area leading through to a second living zone, which showcases a coonara wood heater and gorgeous French doors that open out to the undercover entertaining deck; perfect for hosting family and friends all year round.
The property also comprises four bedrooms, three with built-in robes, master bedroom with ensuite, central main bathroom with shower and bath, separate toilet and large laundry.
Outdoor provides an expansive backyard that is perfect for the little ones to wear themselves out; even including a timber cubby house and has all your storage needs covered with a large double lock up shed.
Set in a convenient location; close to schools, easy access to the Ring Road for the keen commuter, public transport and the bustling Corio shopping precinct, this family home should be at the top of your inspection list.
Roncon Real Estate – An Agency like no other!
All stated dimensions and areas are approximate. Particulars herein are for information only and do not constitute representation by the Owner or Agent.
Insights: 55 Cloverdale Drive, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Corner block - Plans & Permits included!
Located on the corner of Stapledon Court & Epsom Road lies this neat 3 bedroom brick veneer home bursting with character and charm, complete with plans and permits to build a 2 bedroom townhouse at the rear with street frontage. Immaculately presented the home boasts a spacious open planned living area complete with fire place at the entrance, which offers access to the generous sized kitchen containing breakfast bar and meals area. The 3 bedrooms in total all contain BIR's and are easily accessible to the central bathroom found off the main hall. Sliding doors from both the dining room & lounge allow for seamless indoor/outdoor entertaining to the extensive undercover alfresco area which offers wooden lattice for additional privacy. Towards the rear of the 642m2 block sits a double garage with a vast amount of storage area or potential workshop space. Currently vacant the property was previously receiving $300 pw rent perfect for investors, first home buyers or even developers (STCA). Perfectly positioned with just a short stroll to Goldsworthy Reserve and public transport, the Corio Shopping Centre a 2 minute commute and easy access to the Ring Road this home possesses an abundance of potential.
Insights: 2 Stapledon Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Rock Solid Investment
Unassuming from the Street this immaculate 3 BR home with 2 living areas opens up from the minute you step inside the front door. Situated in a handy location close to Corio village Shopping Centre, the ring road and public transport the home comprises a spacious lounge with wall to wall carpet and Coonara wood heater. Adjacent to the lounge is the family dining area and beautiful timber kitchen with gas hot plates and walk in pantry. The large rumpus/2nd living area complete with open fire place overlooks the covered outdoor entertainment area. There is a central bathroom with separate shower and vanity. The tandem garage which also has access to the undercover area is perfect to be used as a man cave. The surrounding low maintenance garden completes this very desirable family home. Rented to first class tenant till 31/3/2018
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Location is Key!
This well-maintained brick home is situated on 532sqm in close proximity to Corio Village Shopping Centre, public transport and the Ring Road. Three bedrooms with built-in-robes are serviced by a central bathroom with separate shower and bath. Entertaining is made easy with a kitchen comprising gas stove and dishwasher. Living zones include lounge room, dining room and sun room at rear. Additional benefits: wall heater, split system inverter and ceiling fan, external sun awnings and alarm system. A fully enclosed rear yard with single lock-up garage and garden shed completes this property.

Description:
Prime property on offer.
Capitalise on the wonderful opportunity to purchase this great first home or investment that boasts an ideal location right in the heart of Corio close to all major amenities. This extremely neat and well maintained home sits on a lavish and secure 616sqm block comprising of 3 generous bedrooms (2 with BIR's), large living area featuring polished floorboards which continue through to the spacious kitchen boasting ample cupboard space, central bathroom & separate laundry. Outside lies a double garage, alfresco at the backdoor & extensive rear yard. Immaculately presented & cared for, this property is a perfect choice to invest in for all. Brilliantly located just minutes to the Corio Shopping Centre, numerous schools for all ages, easily accessible to public transport & just a short commute to Geelong's CBD.

Situated in a convenient location opposite to park and local shops, close to medical clinics, schools and walking distance to Corio Village Shopping Centre & lots more. Currently tenanted for $235 pw the home represents excellent value and is an ideal property to add to your portfolio. Call now to arrange your inspection!

Description:
"Convenient & Low Maintenance"
Situated in the premium estate of Rose Park, homes like this are perfectly suited for those who live a busy lifestyle and seek a contemporary low maintenance property. With a neutral colour palette and modern features including ducted heating & evaporative cooling throughout, enjoy comfortable living all year round without needing to lift a finger.
Youll enjoy the convenience of nearby schools, shopping centres, medical clinics, sporting facilities, and public transport, to service all needs. Only minutes from the freeway, this home is perfect for commuters, with Melbourne under an hour away and Geelong CBD just a 15 minute drive.
-3 bedrooms all with robes
-Master with walk-in-robe & full ensuite
-Two spacious living areas

Capitalise on the wonderful opportunity to purchase this great property that comprises of 3 generous bedrooms (2 with BIR's), large living area with gas heating, spacious kitchen & meals area, central bathroom & separate laundry. Outside lies a single garage with plenty of rear yard to complete the proposed 2nd dwelling (STCA). Immaculately presented & cared for, this property is a neat and tidy investment for all. Brilliantly located in close proximity to the Corio Shopping Centre, numerous schools for all ages, easily accessible public transport & just a short commute to Geelong's CBD. A property with potential like this won't last long, you better be quick. Call us today for further details on plans & permits.

Description:
"Immaculate Home Inside & Out"
This beautifully presented 3 bedroom home is positioned amongst other quality homes in the popular Rose Park Estate and would make an ideal investment, perfect first home or
down sizer!
You will be impressed from the moment you walk in and see the feature tiled entrance. To the left is the formal living with a decorative ceiling rose. On the right is the master bedroom complete with WIR and modern ensuite which also has a pretty ceiling rose. Down the passage the further 2 bedrooms offer BIRs and share a bright and spacious bathroom with a separate toilet.
The modern kitchen overlooks the spacious dining and 2nd living area and is equipped with a 5 burner stainless steel gas cooktop and under bench oven, canopy range hood and island bench.
Outside is an impressive sheltered alfresco entertaining area that is ideal for hosting year round parties while the rest of the yard is perfectly manicured and extremely low maintenance. Additional features include reverse cycle air conditioning, gas central heating, double garage with drive through access and 8 x 2 kw solar panels.
This is the perfect opportunity to purchase a low maintenance home thats ready to move in, with nothing else to do but enjoy and call your own.
-3 Bedrooms & 2 bathrooms
-2 Living areas
-Outdoor entertainment area
-Double garage with drive thru access
-Landscaped gardens
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Just right.
Located in a quiet court in the much sort after Cloverdale Estate, this meticulously presented 3 bedroom brick veneer home is ready for you to move straight in and enjoy! Ideal for first home buyers or investors looking for a neat, well cared for property in a desirable location. With a charming facade and practical floor plan the home offers a spacious open planned living & dining area complete with large kitchen featuring breakfast bar and views of the rear yard. All 3 bedrooms contain BIR's and are serviced by the central bathroom while the master suit comes complete with own ensuite. A single lock up garage offers additional security and peace of mind while also provides drive-through access via a roller door at the rear to the backyard. The well maintained north facing backyard enables ample space for the whole family to enjoy including clothesline and garden shed all situated on a 530m2 (approx.) allotment. Off the main roads, but handy to schools, Corio Shopping Centre, transport and sitting amongst a well-established neighbourhood with excellent access to the Ring Road, a property such as this with so much to offer at such an affordable price will not stay on the market long, call and inspect today.
